attributes.action: Personal Care business to be made exempt from further lockdowns in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Within the personal care industry, hygiene levels are always set at 110% regardless of the novel Covid-19 pandemic, which have now been tripled by 300% with PPE, sterilising and population control. 

The public have stressed how important time with your personal care therapist is surrounding mental health - time with your therapist is proven to release stress. 

The personal care industry is the only industry, that cannot continue to trade online or by means of a takeaway service.
attributes.background: For the personal care sector throughout the UK to be en essential service and be made exempt from further forced closures due to lockdowns.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555408

If you want particular businesses that are not covered by the above petition to be exempted from future lockdowns, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
